price: Esto es para que Dios purifique a los creyentes de sus pecados y destruya a los que desmienten la verdad.
arabic: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَمۡحَقَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
